inn1.comm: Malinga drifts on the pads and Gambhir gently clips it to fine leg

oh sloppy stuff! Sehwag gets an inside edge which goes between his legs, they take the single and Chandimal picks up from the on side and throws to the bowler's end, nobody backing up and four overthrows
full and wide outside off and dabbed to the off side
comes forward and pushes it to the off side
strays a bit on the pads and softly clipped away
nice and straight on the stumps and gently pushed towards cover, the wind's testing the players already
starts off with a wide, really wide outside the off stump, the wind will test the debutant
much better, gets it to nip back in and he tucks it to the on side
slants it wide across the right-hander, doesn't offer a shot
too wide outside off, you have to feel for the bowler, anyone fancy bowling with this wind around?
very close to being another wide outside off, Sehwag leaves it alone
chases a wide one slanting across and well fielded by Dilshan at point, dived to his left and stopped it
too easy for Sehwag, too wide and a bit too short too, carves it over point and third man had no chance
this over just got longer. You don't say. Too wide across the right-hander again
this time Udana strays on the pads, Sehwag clips it away and Thirimanne makes a mess of it at midwicket, two bonus runs
comes round the wicket, still no change of luck, wide outside off and left alone, the wind again
ends a nightmare over for Udana, he bowls it straighter but still gives him enough width to punch it past the covers, good timing and placement
bowls it straighter and he knocks it back to the bowler
same ball, smae result, this time punches it more firmly
great shot, gives him a hint of width and he opens the face and slices it off the meat of the bat past point
a bit too straight and drifts on the pads, he easily works it away past midwicket and it races away, Malinga struggling too here
gets behind the line and knocks it back to the bowler
tucks him up for room and he stays back and defends solidly
stays back and punches it to the off side
punches it solidly to the off side again, Perera starting off well
nips back in and clips his pad and lobs away to the off side, looked close but it hit him too high
gets nicely forward and defends

oh terrific catch! Perera took a very similar catch to get rid of Hafeez in Pallekele, a nothing shot really from Sehwag, fetched it from outside off without moving his feet, swatted it to the bowler's right, Perera reached out and plucked it with both hands on the dive, hangs on to it even on the tumble
tries to flick it away off the pads
strays on the pads and comfortably worked away to fine leg
Kohli safely leaves it alone outside the off stump, straighter delivery
nice and straight and punched off the front foot towards mid-off and he sets off quickly
dabs it towards point and Dilshan does well to stop it
on the pads and clipped to square leg
gets across and defends an incoming delivery

Perera and all the Sri Lankans were convinced, and so was the umpire, after an eternity! Loose shot from Kohli, chasing a ball wide of the off stump, he tried to dab it away towards third man but the keeper detected an edge and went up immediately, it took the umpire Palliyaguruge a while to give that out, either way Kohli didn't look too pleased. He did look back though. Looking at the replays, there was a sound
clips it down to mid-on
gets well forward and blocks it away
Perera's getting the ball to nip back in again, this time the batsman covers the line and defends
poor start by Angelo, full and a touch too wide and firmly punched wide of mid-off, nice follow through as well
works it down to short fine leg and takes a quick single
gets well forward and pats it down to mid-on

the Josephian mafia on a roll here, Mathews in the act now, loose shot from Rohit, no foot movement and he chops the ball onto his off stump, pegs the stump back, he stays at the crrease frustrated with himself
gets off the mark with a clip to fine leg for a single
gets across and gently pushes it to the off side
fullish on the off stump and driven towards mid-off
full and wide and he chases it and drives to mid-off
Sanga fumbles now, the batsman left it alone to the keeper and the ball dipped and went between the keeper's legs, it was a good leave actually

you can't stop Perera here! And guess what, another batsman gets out to a loose shot, almost identical to Rohit's, lack of foot movement again and dragged onto the stumps, the Indians seem to have a problem with the ball leaving them wide of the off stump. Three wickets for Perera and he hasn't yet conceded a run
leaves him outside off and he leaves it alone

Dropped! Mathews spills a sitter at first slip, Dhoni chases a pitched up delivery and the thick outside edge goes at a comfortable height, Mathews juggles and fails to take it on the second attempt, Perera could have had four for nothing
gets on the front foot and defends it softly
fuller delivery and clipped towards midwicket
goes on the back foot and clips it to point
punches it down to cover and refuses the single
defends it to the off side
keeps it straight and defends softly, India struggling to get a run here
Dhoni tries to create an opportunity by chipping down the track, checks the shot and pushes it to mid-off and takes a quick single, Perera concedes his first run
swings it back in and Gambhir gently eases it away to fine leg
big inswing again and Dhoni manages to defend that hard to the off side
solid drive, that should please India greatly, swings it in and Dhoni shows the full face and punches it past a diving mid-off
gets across and leaves it alone to the keeper
fuller delivery and punches it back to the bowler
tucks him up for room on the off stump and safely defended
keeps it on the off stump again and softly defended
a touch fuller and wider this time on the off stump but he mistimes the drive to the off side
doing well to keep it straight and Gambhir defends solidly
drifts on the pads and he clips it straight to square leg
tucked towards midwicket and the fielder fumbles and allows a single, got a bad bounce probably
full outside off and pushed towards point
drifts on the pads and he works it to fine leg
nice shot, gets forward and across to a full delivery and drives wide of cover, Udana gives the chase and dives in vain at the boundary
bowls it a touch shorter and Dhoni safely leaves it alone to the keeper
on a good length on the off stump and solidly defended
keeps it on the stumps and he punches it down the pitch
good length outside the off stump and dabbed towards point
opens the face and dabs it wide of point, easily done
Dhoni leading a charmed life here, the ball nips back in and Dhoni tries to cut but gets an inside edge that sails past the leg stump
walks down the track but leaves it alone, Sanga back flicks it to the stumps, Dhoni ensured he was back at the crease
keeps it fuller and on the middle stump, firmly punched back to the bowler
swings back in and he gets an inside edge to the pads
moves away from him and he leaves it to the keeper
bowls it fuller, gets on the front foot and defends
poor delivery there, too full and wide outside off and slapped off the front foot wide of cover
transfers to the back foot and blocks it away
pitched up and clipped away down to the on side
punched wide of the bowler on the off side and Gambhir thought of the single, Perera picked up and flicked it towards the stumps but he ended up hitting the batsman instead
Dhoni walks! A bit too close to cut, Mathews cramps him up for room, attempts to bash that past point and Sangakkara catches the edge, no doubts about that one
keeps it full and straight on the stumps and neatly flicks it away
fullish on the off stump and driven down to mid-off
angles it across and he pushes it down to point
gets on the front foot and pushes it to mid-off
angles it across and he leaves it alone to the keeper
Malinga strays on the pads and tucks it firmly towards square leg
fullish on the off stump and driven down towards mid-off
tip and run, Gambhir does that really well, drops it to the off side and sets off for a quick single
drifts on the pads again and firmly whipped down to fine leg
good length outside off and he slices it hard past point, the fielder dives but the ball evades him
moves away from the left-hander and he dabs it down to third man
good length into the left-hander from over the wicket, dabbed from the crease towards point
good length pitching outside off stump and angling into Irfan, who strides forward and defends
punched off the front foot towards mid off
short of a length aimed at the body, Irfan turns the ball towards square
too wide outside off stump, plenty of width for Gambhir to free his arms and hit the ball through cover point. Chandimal chases and slides to save the boundary in the nick of time
Irfan drives away from his body and gets an outside edge towards third man
Malinga bowls this one a bit short , he tries to cut but the extra bounce nearly had him there
clips it down to square leg for a quick single
opens the face of the bat and steers it down to point
cramps him up for room as he tries to cut, ends up chopping it down to the keeper
stays on the back foot and defends with soft hands
good cover drive off the meat of the bat but deep cover is there to pick up
gives him a lot of width and he opens the face and glides it down to third man
slants it inwards and fuller, nicely punched down to mid-off
Pathan hitting them well but straight to the fielders, straight to cover this time
slower ball on the pads and worked away down to fine leg
wide outside the off stump, he safely leaves it alone to the keeper

close call for Pathan! He wasn't ready for the shorter delivery, it didn't bounce as much, tried to knock it to the on side but got an edge that lobbed towards the slips, Thirimanne did his best to run forward and catch but he was still miles away from taking it
plays the short one better this time, takes it in front of the chest and clips it to the leg side
nearly an edge! Moves away as he tries to dab that to third man, nearly gives Sanga a catch
knocks it down to third man for a single

leading edge! Another batsman goes to a loose shot, Pathan has to go, Malinga drifts towards the pads and Irfan tries to work it to the on side with the angle, only gets a tame leading edge that lobs to Perera (that man again) at mid-off, there was some doubt if Malinga had overstepped the crease, a part of his boot was slightly behind the line, took a few replays to confirm
pushes it down towards mid-off
stays back at the crease and defends
angles it inwards and solidly defends again, Gambhir has seen so many partners come and go
works it down to midwicket and sets off
stays back at the crease and softly knocks it to the off side
brings this one back in and Ashwin stays back and knocks it to the on side
clips it off the pads wide of square leg and the ball races towards the boundary, Malinga sprints from fine leg and boots it away at the nick of time
short of a length and Ashwin goes back at the crease and tucks it to the on side
keeps it short to Gambhir as well, hops at the crease and dabs it down to point
another short one but down the leg side and worked away down to fine leg
bowls it fuller and on the stumps, shows the full face and defends solidly
keeps it full and on the stumps again, he is happy to defend it
outside edge and it sneaks through! Full outside off and he goes for the drive, the ball hits the turf and travels low and wide of keeper and slip
a touch too short and he cuts it wide of square third man for a couple
cuts him down to sweeper cover for a single
take that for timing! Short and angling wide across him, Ashwin stands tall and takes it high on the bat, glides it away wide of point and third man had no chance
drifts on the pads and he works it down to deep midwicket
comes round the wicket, bowls a disciplined, straight line and defended
comes round the wicket, tossed up and gently worked down to mid-on
tossed up on middle and worked to the on side
gets forward and drives towards point
takes a couple of paces down and knocks it towards mid-on
bad fielding! Ashwin took a pace forward and punched it towards short cover, Dilshan could easily have stopped that but it beat him and raced to the rope, the fielder dived in vain

Ashwin will never want to see this replay, surely! The ball floats in to him, he makes room and slices it well to third man, he takes two comfortably, Gambhir doesn't want the third and signals him to stay back, Ashwin ambled out of his crease and turns around but it's too late, the throw arrives and Sanga whips off the bails
fuller delivery and clipped to deep square leg
short and wide and cut, the fielder dives and gets a hand to it
short of a length and he stays back and clips it to the leg side
fuller delivery on the pads and worked down to square leg, thinks of a single
gives him width and he angles it down to third man
stays on the back foot and defends it away
comes down the track and drills it down to long-off
tossed up and defended easily
the arm ball gets him, gets a nice loop into the right-hander from round the wicket, Zaheer was forward to defend, the ball clips the pad in front of the leg stump, easy decision
comes forward and he's beaten by one that skidded through
comes well forward and blocks it out
drifts on the pads and he works it down towards square leg, takes a couple and he gets to his fifty, something his colleagues have failed to do
gets a thick inside edge onto his pads, the ball rolls to the off side
goes back at the crease and defends towards point
full and wide and driven straight to mid-off
clips it down towards midwicket for a single
on the stumps and Ojha awkwardly pushes it to the off side
tossed up and he gets forward and pushes it towards long-on
gets an inside edge to the on side for a single
tossed up and pushed towards long-on, uses his feet well
works it down to square leg for a single
flicks it down towards short midwicket
stays back and punches it hard down to mid-on
fuller delivery and pushed back to the bowler very firmly
slants it across and he dabs it down to third man
stays at the crease and manages to push it away to the off side
slants it across him and he leaves it alone to the keeper
stays back at the crease and defends it away
full outside off and driven to the off side
gets forward and blocks it away off the front foot
takes a pace down and knocks it towards mid-on
beats the drive and Sanga whips off the bails
nicely driven but straight to short cover
comes well forward and drives to cover
full on the off stump and driven straight to the covers
beats the covers this time with the front foot drive for a single, still not farming the strike
Ojha does quite well to get across and push it to the off side
opens the face and slices it down to point, the fielder dives and saves it but cannot prevent the single
gets on the front foot and steers it down to third man
a touch too short outside the off stump, Ojha decides not to play at it
makes room, comes down by a couple of yards and works it to wide long-on
gets half forward and steers it to the off side
gets down the pitch and works him down to long-on again, easily done
there's an attacking field for Ojhan but he manages to work around it, steered towards point with soft hands for a quick single
lets it to skid through, opens the face and steers it to short third man
flighted on the pads and flicked towards deep midwicket
opens the face of the bat and steers it down to third man
this one moves away and just beats the outside edge

this time he gets the edge! Mathews bowls a delivery similar to the previous one, this time Ojha gets across for a half hearted drive and gets an edge and looks back at the keeper, Sanga was certain about it, India nine down
Yadav very awkwardly lets that go to the keeper, not too far from hitting it
gets across and punched it confidently back to the bowler
rare gift on the pads, nudges it off his legs and beats the keeper and that's four leg byes
low full toss wide of the off stump and sliced towards sweeper cover, Gambhir charges for the second and Mathews' throw isn't accurate, Sanga tries to fling it at the stumps but Gambhir was home
full and wide outside off and he tries to squeeze it out

great catch by Sanga to round off the innings and Gambhir fails to carry his bat! Malinga fires it full and wide and Gambhir tries to squirt it out to third man, the ball lobs off the face of the bat and Sangakkara flings himself to his left and plucks it one handed and tumbles

inn2.comm: Zaheer begins with a wide down the leg side, he could be a handful with the wind
spoke too soon, too wide down the leg side and Dhoni manages to get some glove on it and parry it away down to fine leg, could've been worse
lands it outside the off stump and gets it to slant away and Dilshan leaves it alone
chases this one and ends up chopping it to the off side
lands it outside off and Tharanga leaves it alone
gets forward and defends it
wide outside the off stump, this over gets longer, Zaheer can cry on Udana's shoulder now
goes back and taps it to the bowler
drifts down the leg side and another wide, well taken by Dhoni and he alf heartedly appeals for a catch thinking Tharanga may have clipped something
bowls it straight and Tharanga leaves it alone
pushes at the ball outside off and fails to make contact
stays back and punches it down to cover
gets some neat inswing and catches Dilshan off guard as he tried to whip it away, lobs off the pads
half-hearted drive by Tharanga and he nearly edges this one, three slips waiting for that edge
drifts on the pads and works it away down to midwicket for a couple
bowls it straighter and he clips it towards mid-on
much better line, straight as it can get, stays back and clips it away to mid-on
patiently lets it go outside the off stump, the ball doesn't move much
a touch shorter and Tharanga continues to be watchful, left alone
clips it down to mid-on and thinks of a single
great way to end the over, it was as if Tharanga was waiting for that error, too full and easily driven past mid-off and cover, good follow through and timing
Dilshan awkward again with the inswing, tries to work it away but the ball clips his pads again
fuller and he tries to wham it straight but ends up mistiming the shot back to the bowler
stays back and punches it down the track
nice, firm punch down the track, showed the full face, Dilshan is better off playing the ball a bit late

Dropped The shot wasn't too pretty either, full and wide, Dilshan threw everything at it, Sehwag cupped his hands above his head at first slip and the ball deflected past the keeper and down to fine leg, it came on much quicker than expected
a little short of a length and punched down to sweeper cover
Tharanga at his best, full and wide outside off and he leans forward and plays an effortless cover drive
good comeback by Zaheer, held the length  back and tempted him to drive again, nearly took the edge
leans forward to drive again but cannot beat cover
leaves this alone to the keeper
drifts on the pads and the ball clips his pads and rolls away
cuts and goes over the slips and down to third man
punches it towards cover
tries to cut but the ball goes under the bat, played at it too early
too wide outside off and he slices this square of the wicket on the off side and beats point, the ball travels against the wind and doesn't reach the boundary
another lovely shot! Short and wide and Tharanga exploits the big gap at point and cover but thumping it to the boundary
clipped off his pads to the on side
Dilshan whips it away towards fine leg where Ojha fumbles
too full and Tharanga has thumped it, he came on the front foot and played a flowing drive between the bowler and mid-off
defended on the front foot on the leg side
pushed off the front foot towards cover point
Tharanga aimed for the big shot down the ground but made no contact
nudged towards mid-on for a single
Dilshan tries to hit through the off side but gets an inside edge towards square leg
angles it across him and he gets forward and punches it towards mid-off
Dilshan decides to walk down the pitch and club the short delivery to the leg side, nearly gloves it to Dhoni, half-hearted appeal
punched away hard and Kohli does brilliantly to stop it with one hand, he threw to the bowler's end
chance! Dilshan tries to pull and gets an edge that hits his arm and just evades Sehwag at first slip, the ball nearly rolls to the third man rope but Zaheer manages to stop it
bowls it too wide of the off stump
this time he strays down the leg side
keeps it straight and Tharanga gets forward to defend
straight again and he gets forward and knocks it towards mid-on
yet another wide, the left-armers aren't having a great day, down the leg side
rounds off a poor over, Irfan bowls this one short and wide outside off, Tharanga waits for it and punches it past the gap at the covers, nobody moved
loosener to begin with, pitched up outside off and Dilshan reaches forward and scoops it over mid-off
overcompensates by bowling too full and on the pads, Dilshan uses his wrists well and flicks it wide of midwicket
bowls it short and Dilshan is too early on the pull, ends up mistiming it to the on side
pushed firmly back to the bowler
drives a full delivery and nearly evades mid-off, Ojha dives and gets a hand to it
short and pulled away in front of square, Ashwin picks it up at deep midwicket and that will be the dinner break
starts off with a half volley on the pads, gets across and clips it away past square leg, plenty of spaces on the on side
on the pads again and worked to the on side
fullish in length outside off and left alone, slight away movement
drifts down the leg side and even Dhoni can't stop it, gets a glove to it and parries it to fine leg
struggles with his line and drifts down the leg side again, clips his thigh and beats Dhoni
gets on the front foot and drives wide of sweeper cover
bowls it straighter for a change, Tharanga tries to drive straight but ends up placing it to the on side
tossed up on the off stump and worked to the on side
flicks it down to midwicket
pushes a low full toss down to long-off
stays back at the crease, waits for the turn and cuts
turns it down to fine leg to bring up his 2000th run v India
flatter delivery, opens the face and dabs it down to third man
the waywardness continues, down the leg side again and Zaheer has no control over this, neither does Dhoni, flicked away and beats the keeper to race to fine leg
much better, stays back at the crease and defends
too full and wide outside the off stump and punched away wide of the covers, the sweeper cuts it off
bowls from slightly wide of the crease and bends it in, gets across and defends
another silken drive, more a forward push, relied on timing purely, behind the line and punched wide of Raina at mid-off
brings the ball back in and Tharanga defends
the straighter delivery, beats the outside edge
goes back, waits for the turn and cuts to point
gets down to sweep and places it to fine leg
goes back and punches it to the off side
flicks  it with the turn to fine leg
makes room and punches it off the back foot down to deep point
full on middle and leg and clippedtowards fine leg
full outside off and nicely driven off the front foot to sweeper cover
tries to squirt out a yorker outside the off stump but misses
bangs it in short and Dilshan swivels and pulls down to deep square leg
good bouncer, Tharanga arches backwards and lets it sail over him
punches it firmly to short cover
goes back and punches it down to point
clips it with the angle to square leg for a single
slides inwards and he gets an inside edge to the pads
drives him down to sweeper cover
Dilshan is beaten as he tries to cut, too close to play that shot, he punches the air in frustration, luckily Dhoni was out of the way
gets behind the line and defends down to cover
excellent fielding there, Tharanga tapped it with soft hands down to mid-off and Raina picked up and flicked it towards the bowler's stumps in one motion, nearly a direct hit
fails to squeeze out a fat yorker outside off
that was dismissed! Yadav bowled it a fraction short, Dilshan picked the length quickly, swiveled and pulled it with force along the ground to deep square leg
pulls this one but not fully controlled, the ball lands safely over midwicket
this is finishing quick, short of a length and he punched it with force past the covers, bisected the gap
tucked away to the deep on the on side for a couple
chips down the track and hammers it in the air down to long-off

Sri Lanka miss their chance to record their first ten-wicket win against India, flighted on the off stump, he tries to slog it away and gets an edge that strikes the pads and lobs up to Dhoni who runs forward and takes the catch
drifts down the leg side and wide called, yet again
stays back and safely blocks it out
clips it to the leg side to get off the mark
drifts on the pads and he works it towards midwicket for a single
silken again, gives him width, Tharanga merely uses the pace of the ball (there was plenty of it) and slices it effortlessly wide of point, big gap there on the deep
driven straight towards the covers
bowls the short one and Tharanga goes for the wild hoick and clears the keeper with a top edge, nearly goes all the way
cuts it square of the wicket on the off side for a couple
gets forward and defends
defends this one to the on side
gets forward and punches it back to the bowler
punches it back to the bowler
tucks it away towards midwicket, a rare quiet over here
gets well forward and defends towards the off side
goes back at the crease and punches it wide of cover and the fielder slides and stops it
gets an outside edge that goes towards point for a single
that seals a crushing win for Sri Lanka! Tossed up outside the off stump and Chandimal reaches out and gets an outside edge that sails past slip and short third man
